--- title: "homework1" author: "강남규" date: "2024-07-12" categories: [bigdata] --- ## 84페이지 혼자서 해보기 Q1 ::: {#6f8a01b1 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df = pd.DataFrame({'제품' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'], '가격' : [1800, 1500, 3000], '판매량' : [24, 38, 13]} ) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: Q2 ::: {#ee1ee82c .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} sum(df['가격']) / 3 # 과일의 가격 평균 sum(df['판매량']) / 3 # 판매량 평균균 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` 25.0 ``` ::: ::: ## 115페이지 혼자서 해보기기 Q1 ::: {#7a21d6a9 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg = pd.read_csv('mpg.csv') mpg_copy = mpg.copy() mpg_copy ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: Q2 poptotal변수를 total로, popasian변수를 asian으로 수정하세요 ::: {#52ed0258 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} mid = mid.rename(columns = {'poptotal' : 'total'}) mid = mid.rename(columns = {'popasian' : 'asian'}) mid.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 437 entries, 0 to 436 Data columns (total 28 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 PID 437 non-null int64 1 county 437 non-null object 2 state 437 non-null object 3 area 437 non-null float64 4 total 437 non-null int64 5 popdensity 437 non-null float64 6 popwhite 437 non-null int64 7 popblack 437 non-null int64 8 popamerindian 437 non-null int64 9 asian 437 non-null int64 10 popother 437 non-null int64 11 percwhite 437 non-null float64 12 percblack 437 non-null float64 13 percamerindan 437 non-null float64 14 percasian 437 non-null float64 15 percother 437 non-null float64 16 popadults 437 non-null int64 17 perchsd 437 non-null float64 18 percollege 437 non-null float64 19 percprof 437 non-null float64 20 poppovertyknown 437 non-null int64 21 percpovertyknown 437 non-null float64 22 percbelowpoverty 437 non-null float64 23 percchildbelowpovert 437 non-null float64 24 percadultpoverty 437 non-null float64 25 percelderlypoverty 437 non-null float64 26 inmetro 437 non-null int64 27 category 437 non-null object dtypes: float64(15), int64(10), object(3) memory usage: 95.7+ KB ``` ::: ::: Q3 total, asian변수를 이용해 '전체 인구 대비 아시아 인구 백분율' 파생변수를 추가하고, 히스토그램을 만들어 분포를 살펴보세요. ::: {#4ee0b767 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} mid['asia_per'] = (mid['asian'] / mid['total']) * 100 mid.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#1eff578d .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt mid['asia_per'].plot.hist() plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw1_files/figure-html/cell-12-output-1.png){width=593 height=411} ::: ::: Q4 아시아 인구 백분율 전체 평균을 구하고, 평균을 초과하면 'large', 그 외에는 'small'을 부여한 파생변수를 만들어 보세요. ::: {#262940b3 .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} asia_mean = mid['asia_per'].mean() asia_mean ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12} ``` 0.4872461834357345 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#faf76885 .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np mid['lar_sml'] = np.where(mid['asia_per'] > asia_mean, 'large', 'small') mid['lar_sml'].head(10) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13} ``` 0 small 1 small 2 small 3 small 4 small 5 large 6 small 7 small 8 small 9 large Name: lar_sml, dtype: object ``` ::: ::: Q5 'large'와 'small'에 해당되는 지역이 얼마나 많은지 빈도ㅛ와 빈도 막대 그래프를 만들어 확인해 보세요. ::: {#446a328e .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} plt.clf() count = mid['lar_sml'].value_counts() count ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=14} ``` small 318 large 119 Name: lar_sml, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```
